instructionSteps.title: 1. Create ARM Resources and Provide the Required Permissions
instructionSteps.description: This connector reads data from the tables that Jamf Protect uses in a Microsoft Analytics Workspace, if the [data forwarding](https://docs.jamf.com/jamf-protect/documentation/Data_Forwarding_to_a_Third_Party_Storage_Solution.html?hl=sentinel#task-4227) option is enabled in Jamf Protect then raw event data is sent to the Microsoft Sentinel Ingestion API.

parameters.content:
#### Automated Configuration and Secure Data Ingestion with Entra Application 
Clicking on "Connect" will trigger the creation of Log Analytics tables and a Data Collection Rule (DCR). 
It will then create an Entra application, link the DCR to it, and set the entered secret in the application. This setup enables data to be sent securely to the DCR using an Entra token.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Push your logs into the workspace
instructionSteps.description: Use the following parameters to configure the your machine to send the logs to the workspace.

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
//ASIM - Generic Fields
| extend
    EventVendor = metadata.vendor,
    EventProduct = metadata.product,
    EventSchemaVersion = metadata.schemaVersion,
    EventProductVersion = host.protectVersion,
    EventSeverity = "Informational",
    //
    // Jamf Protect - Device Hostnames
    TargetHostname = host.hostname,
    DvcHostname = host.hostname,
    DvcSerial = host.serial,
    DvcIpAddr = host.ips,
    DvcId = host.provisioningUDID,
    DvcOs = "macOS",
    DvcOsVersion = host.os,
    SrcDeviceType = "Computer"
| project-rename
    TimeGenerated = ['time'],
    EventOriginalUid = uuid,
    EventOriginalType = event_type,
    EventCount = glob_seq_num
| project-away
    metadata,
    host,
    seq_num,
    version,
    deadline,
    mach_time,
    action_type

source
//ASIM - Generic Fields
| extend
    EventVendor = "Jamf",
    EventProduct = "Unified Log Stream",
    // EventSchemaVersion = metadata.schemaVersion,
    EventProductVersion = input.host.protectVersion,
    EventSeverity = case(input.match.severity == 0, "Informational", input.match.severity == 1, "Low", input.match.severity == 2, "Medium", input.match.severity == 3, "High", "Informational"),
    EventOriginalType = input.eventType,
    EventOriginalUid = input.match.uuid,
    EventType = "UnifiedLog",
    EventResult = case(input.match.actions has "Prevented", "Prevented", "Allowed"),
    EventMessage = input.match.event.name,
    EventResultMessage = input.match.event.composedMessage,
    // EventReportUrl = strcat("https://", context_identity_claims_hd_s, ".jamfcloud.com/Alerts/", input.match.uuid),
    //     //
    //     // Jamf Protect - Device Hostnames
    TargetHostname = input.host.hostname,
    DvcHostname = input.host.hostname,
    DvcSerial = input.host.serial,
    DvcIpAddr = input.host.ips,
    DvcId = input.host.provisioningUDID,
    DvcOs = "macOS",
    DvcOsVersion = input.host.os,
    SrcDeviceType = "Computer",
    // Jamf Protect - Event Details
    //
    // Jamf Protect Alerts - Process
    //
    ProcessEventType = "Create",
    ProcessEventSubType = "Exec",
    TargetProcessName = tostring(input.match.event.process),
    TargetProcessId = toreal(input.match.event.processIdentifier),
    TargetProcessGuid = tostring(input.match.event.uuid),
    TargetProcessCommandLine = input.match.event.process.args,
    TargetProcessCurrentDirectory = input.match.event.processImagePath
| project-away
    caid,
    certid

source
// ASIM - Common Fields
| extend EventVendor = 'Jamf'
| extend EventProduct = 'Device Telemetry Stream'
// Data Field Normalization
| extend
    EventSeverity = "Informational",
    //
    // Jamf Protect Telemetry - Endpoint Information
    //
    TargetModel = metrics.hw_model,
    DvcOsVersion = host_info.osversion,
    TargetHostname = host_info.host_name,
    DvcHostname = host_info.host_name,
    DvcId = host_info.host_uuid,
    // Jamf Protect - Event Types
    EventType = case(
                header.event_name == "AUE_add_to_group",
                "UserAddedToGroup",
                header.event_name == "AUE_AUDITCTL",
                "AuditEvent",
                header.event_name == "AUE_AUDITON_SPOLICY",
                "AuditEvent",
                header.event_name == "AUE_auth_user",
                "Elevate",
                header.event_name == "AUE_BIND",
                "EndpointNetworkSession",
                header.event_name == "AUE_BIOS_FIRMWARE_VERSIONS",
                "SystemInformation",
                header.event_name == "AUE_CHDIR",
                "FolderMoved",
                header.event_name == "AUE_CHROOT",
                "FolderModified",
                header.event_name == "AUE_CONNECT",
                "EndpointNetworkSession",
                header.event_name == "AUE_create_group",
                "GroupCreated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_create_user",
                "UserCreated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_delete_group",
                "GroupDeleted",
                header.event_name == "AUE_delete_user",
                "UserDeleted",
                header.event_name == "AUE_EXECVE",
                "ProcessCreated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_EXIT",
                "ProcessTerminated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_FORK",
                "ProcessCreated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_GETAUID",
                "",
                header.event_name == "AUE_KILL",
                "ProcessTerminated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_LISTEN",
                "EndpointNetworkSession",
                header.event_name == "AUE_logout",
                "Logoff",
                header.event_name == "AUE_lw_login",
                "Logon",
                header.event_name == "AUE_MAC_SET_PROC",
                "AuditEvent",
                header.event_name == "AUE_modify_group",
                "GroupModified",
                header.event_name == "AUE_modify_password",
                "PasswordChanged",
                header.event_name == "AUE_modify_user",
                "UserModified",
                header.event_name == "AUE_MOUNT",
                "VolumeMount",
                header.event_name == "AUE_openssh",
                "SshInitiated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_PIDFORTASK",
                "ProcessCreated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_POSIX_SPAWN",
                "ProcessCreated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_remove_from_group",
                "UserRemovedFromGroup",
                header.event_name == "AUE_SESSION_CLOSE",
                "Logoff",
                header.event_name == "AUE_SESSION_END",
                "Logoff",
                header.event_name == "AUE_SESSION_START",
                "Logon",
                header.event_name == "AUE_SESSION_UPDATE",
                "",
                header.event_name == "AUE_SETPRIORITY",
                "",
                header.event_name == "AUE_SETSOCKOPT",
                "",
                header.event_name == "AUE_SETTIMEOFDAY",
                "SystemChange",
                header.event_name == "AUE_shutdown",
                "ShutdownInitiated",
                header.event_name == "AUE_SOCKETPAIR",
                "",
                header.event_name == "AUE_ssauthint",
                "Elevate",
                header.event_name == "AUE_ssauthmech",
                "Elevate",
                header.event_name == "AUE_ssauthorize",
                "Elevate",
                header.event_name == "AUE_TASKFORPID",
                "",
                header.event_name == "AUE_TASKNAMEFORPID",
                "",
                header.event_name == "AUE_UNMOUNT",
                "VolumeUnmount",
                header.event_name == "AUE_WAIT4",
                "ProcessTerminated",
                header.event_name == "PLAINTEXT_LOG_COLLECTION_EVENT",
                "LogFileCollected",
                header.event_name == "SYSTEM_PERFORMANCE_METRICS",
                "SystemPerformanceMetrics",
                "Unknown"
            ),
    //
    // Jamf Protect Telemetry - Process
    //
    ActingProcessId = toreal(subject.responsible_process_id),
    ActingProcessName = tostring(subject.responsible_process_name),
    ParentProcessName = tostring(subject.parent_path),
    ParentProcessId = toreal(subject.parent_pid),
    ParentProcessGuid = tostring(subject.parent_uuid),
    TargetProcessName = tostring(subject.process_name),
    TargetProcessId = toreal(subject.process_id),
    TargetProcessGuid = tostring(exec_chain.uuid),
    TargetProcessSHA256 = tostring(subject.process_hash),
    TargetUserId = toreal(subject.user_id),
    TargetUsername = tostring(subject.user_name),
    TargetProcessCommandLine = exec_args.args_compiled,
    ActorUsername = tostring(subject.effective_user_name),
    ActorUserId = toreal(subject.audit_user_name),
    //
    // Jamf Protect Telemetry - Audit/Group
    //
    GroupName = tostring(subject.group_name),
    GroupID = toreal(subject.group_id),
    EffectiveGroupName = tostring(subject.effective_group_name),
    EffectiveGroupID = toreal(subject.effective_group_id),
    //
    // Jamf Protect Telemetry - Network
    //
    DstIpAddr = socket_inet.ip_address,
    DstPortNumber = socket_inet.port,
    NetworkProtocolVersion = case(socket_inet.id == 128, "IPV4", socket_inet.id == 129, "IPV6", ""),
    SrcIpAddr = subject.terminal.id.ip.address,
    //
    // Jamf Protect Telemetry - Binaries
    //
    TargetBinarySHA256 = tostring(identity.cd_hash),
    TargetbinarySignerType = case(identity.signer_type == 0, "Developer", identity.signer_type == 1, "Apple", ""),
    TargetBinarySigningTeamID = tostring(identity.team_id),
    TargetBinarySigningAppID = tostring(identity.signer_id),
    //
    // Jamf Protect Telemetry - Log File Collection
    //
    TargetFilePath = path
| project-away _event_score

source
//ASIM - Generic Fields
| extend
    EventVendor = "Jamf",
    EventProduct = "Alerts Stream",
    //     EventSchemaVersion = metadata.schemaVersion,
    EventProductVersion = input.host.protectVersion,
    EventSeverity = case(input.match.severity == 0, "Informational", input.match.severity == 1, "Low", input.match.severity == 2, "Medium", input.match.severity == 3, "High", "Informational"),
    EventOriginalType = input.eventType,
    EventOriginalUid = input.match.uuid,
    EventType = case(
                input.eventType == "GPClickEvent",
                "Click",
                input.eventType == "GPDownloadEvent",
                "Download",
                input.eventType == "GPFSEvent",
                "FileSystem",
                input.eventType == "GPProcessEvent",
                "Process",
                input.eventType == "GPKeylogRegisterEvent",
                "Keylog",
                input.eventType == "GPGatekeeperEvent",
                "Gatekeeper",
                input.eventType == "GPMRTEvent",
                "MRT",
                input.eventType == "GPPreventedExecutionEvent",
                "ProcessDenied",
                input.eventType == "GPThreatMatchExecEvent",
                "ProcessPrevented",
                input.eventType == "GPUnifiedLogEvent",
                "UnifiedLog",
                input.eventType == "GPUSBEvent",
                "USB",
                input.eventType == "auth-mount",
                "UsbBlock",
                "Unknown"
            ),
    EventResult = case(input.match.actions has "Prevented", "Prevented", "Allowed"),
    EventMessage = input.match.facts[0].name,
    EventResultMessage = input.match.facts[0].human,
    //
    // Jamf Protect - Device Hostnames
    //
    TargetHostname = input.host.hostname,
    DvcHostname = input.host.hostname,
    DvcSerial = input.host.serial,
    DvcIpAddr = input.host.ips,
    DvcId = input.host.provisioningUDID,
    DvcOs = "macOS",
    DvcOsVersion = input.host.os,
    SrcDeviceType = "Computer",
    //
    // Jamf Protect Alerts - Process
    //
    ProcessEventType = case(input.match.event.type == 0, "None", input.match.event.type == 1, "Create", input.match.event.type == 2, "Exit", ""),
    ProcessEventSubType = case(input.match.event.subType == 7, "Exec", input.match.event.subType == 1, "Fork", input.match.event.subType == 23, "Execve", input.match.event.subType == 43190, "Posix Spawn", ""),
    ActingProcessName = tostring(input.related.processes[array_length(input.related.processes) - 1].path),
    ActingProcessId = toreal(input.related.processes[0].responsiblePID),
    ActingProcessGuid = tostring(input.related.processes[array_length(input.related.processes) - 1].uuid),
    ParentProcessName = todynamic(iff(array_length(input.related.processes) > 1, tostring(input.related.processes[1].path), "")),
    ParentProcessId = iff(array_length(input.related.processes) > 1, toreal(input.related.processes[1].pid), double(null)),
    ParentProcessGuid = tostring(iff(array_length(input.related.processes) > 1, tostring(input.related.processes[1].uuid), "")),
    TargetProcessName = todynamic(input.related.processes[0].name),
    TargetProcessId = input.related.processes[0].pid,
    TargetProcessGuid = input.related.processes[0].uuid,
    TargetProcessSHA1 = tostring(input.related.binaries[0].sha1hex),
    TargetProcessSHA256 = tostring(input.related.binaries[0].sha256hex),
    TargetProcessCommandLine = input.related.processes[0].args,
    TargetProcessCurrentDirectory = tostring(input.related.processes[0].path),
    TargetProcessStatusCode = toreal(input.related.processes[0].exitCode),
    //
    // Jamf Protect Alerts - Files
    //
    TargetFilePath = input.related.files[0].path,
    TargetFileSHA1 = input.related.files[0].sha1hex,
    TargetFileSHA256 = input.related.files[0].sha256hex,
    TargetFileSize = input.related.files[0].size,
    TargetFileSigningInfoMessage = input.related.files[0].signingInfo.statusMessage,
    TargetFileSignerType = case(input.related.files[0].signingInfo.signerType == 0, "Apple", input.related.files[0].signingInfo.signerType == 1, "App Store", input.related.files[0].signingInfo.signerType == 2, "Developer", input.related.files[0].signingInfo.signerType == 3, "Ad Hoc", input.related.files[0].signingInfo.signerType == 4, "Unsigned", ""),
    TargetFileSigningTeamID = input.related.files[0].signingInfo.teamid,
    TargetFileIsDownload = tobool(input.related.files[0].isDownload),
    TargetFileIsAppBundle = tobool(input.related.files[0].isAppBundle),
    TargetFileIsDirectory = tobool(input.related.files[0].isDirectory),
    TargetFileIsScreenshot = tobool(input.related.files[0].isScreenShot),
    TargetFileExtendedAttributes = input.related.files[0].xattrs,
    // Jamf Protect Alerts - Binaries
    TargetBinaryFilePath = input.related.binaries[0].path,
    TargetBinarySHA1 = input.related.binaries[0].sha1hex,
    TargetBinarySHA256 = input.related.binaries[0].sha256hex,
    TargetBinarySigningInfoMessage = input.related.binaries[0].signingInfo.statusMessage,
    TargetbinarySignerType = case(input.related.binaries[0].signingInfo.signerType == 0, "Apple", input.related.binaries[0].signingInfo.signerType == 1, "App Store", input.related.binaries[0].signingInfo.signerType == 2, "Developer", input.related.binaries[0].signingInfo.signerType == 3, "Ad Hoc", input.related.binaries[0].signingInfo.signerType == 4, "Unsigned", ""),
    TargetBinarySigningTeamID = input.related.binaries[0].signingInfo.teamid,
    TargetBinarySigningAppID = input.related.binaries[0].signingInfo.appid
| project-away
    caid,
    certid

properties.query:
let JamfProtectAlerts_view  = view () {
jamfprotectalerts_CL
| extend
    ActingProcessCreationTime = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(tolong(input.related.processes[array_length(input.related.processes) - 1].startTimestamp)),
    ParentProcessCreationTime = iff(
                                array_length(input.related.processes) > 1, 
                                unixtime_seconds_todatetime(tolong(input.related.processes[0].startTimestamp)), 
                                datetime(null)
                            ),
    TargetProcessCreationTime = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(todouble(input.related.processes[0].startTimestamp)),
    TargetUserId = coalesce(input.related.users[1].uid, input.related.users[0].uid),
    TargetUsername = coalesce(input.related.users[1].name, input.related.users[0].name)
    };
let JamfProtectUnifiedLog_view  = view () {
jamfprotectunifiedlogs_CL
| extend EventStartTime = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(tolong(input.match.event.timestamp))
};
//
// Jamf Protect - Endpoint Telemetry
//
let JamfProtectTelemetryv1_view  = view () {
jamfprotecttelemetryv1_CL
| extend
    EventStartTime = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(todouble(header.time_seconds_epoch)),
    EventResult = coalesce(return.description, texts)
};
let JamfProtectTelemetryv2_view  = view () {
jamfprotecttelemetryv2_CL
// Generic Fields
| extend
    EventExpanded = tostring(parse_json(event)[strcat_array(bag_keys(event), '.')]),
    eventTypeHuman = tostring(bag_keys(event)[0])

// Event Specific - screenscharing_attach & screensharing_detach
| extend Screensharing = iif(
                            eventTypeHuman in ("screensharing_attach", "screensharing_detach"),
                            bag_pack(
    "existing_session",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].existing_session), event[eventTypeHuman].existing_session, ""),
    "graphical_session_id",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].graphical_authentication_username), event[eventTypeHuman].graphical_authentication_username, ""),
    "session_username",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].session_username), event[eventTypeHuman].session_username, ""),
    "viewer_appleid",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].viewer_appleid), event[eventTypeHuman].viewer_appleid, ""),
    "authentication_type",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].authentication_type), event[eventTypeHuman].authentication_type, ""),
    "source_address",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].source_address), event[eventTypeHuman].source_address, ""),
    "source_address_type", 
    iff(
    isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].source_address_type),
    case(
    event[eventTypeHuman].source_address_type == 0,
    "Unknown",
    event[eventTypeHuman].source_address_type == 1,
    "IPv4",
    event[eventTypeHuman].source_address_type == 2,
    "IPv6",
    event[eventTypeHuman].source_address_type == 3,
    "UNIX Socket",
    "Unknown"
),
    "" 
)
),
                            dynamic(null)
                        )
// Event Specific - su
| extend Su = iif(
                eventTypeHuman == "su",
                bag_pack(
    "username",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].username), event[eventTypeHuman].username, ""),
    "uid",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].uid), event[eventTypeHuman].uid, ""),
    "args",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].argv), event[eventTypeHuman].argv, ""),
    "env_vars",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].env), event[eventTypeHuman].env, ""),
    "env_count",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].env_count), event[eventTypeHuman].env_count, ""),
    "from_username",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].from_username), event[eventTypeHuman].from_username, ""),
    "to_username",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].to_username), event[eventTypeHuman].to_username, ""),
    "failure_message",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].failure_reason), event[eventTypeHuman].failure_reason, "")
),
                dynamic(null)
            )
// Event Specific - sudo
| extend Sudo = iif(
                    eventTypeHuman == "sudo",
                    bag_pack(
    "TargetProcessCommandLine",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].command), event[eventTypeHuman].command, ""),
    "attribute_name",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].attribute_name), event[eventTypeHuman].attribute_name, ""),
    "attribute_value",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].attribute_value), event[eventTypeHuman].attribute_value, "")
),
                    dynamic(null)
                )
// Event Specific - xp_malware_detected & xp_malware_remediated
| extend Xprotect = iif(
                        eventTypeHuman in ("xp_malware_detected", "xp_malware_remediated"),
                        bag_pack(
    "detected_path",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].detected_path), event[eventTypeHuman].detected_path, ""),
    "remediated_path",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].remediated_path), event[eventTypeHuman].remediated_path, ""),
    "malware_identifier",

    "signature_version",
    iff(isnotempty(event[eventTypeHuman].signature_version), event[eventTypeHuman].signature_version, "")
),
                        dynamic(null)
                    )
| project-away
action,
event,
process

// Jamf Protect - Network Traffic

let JamfProtectNetworkTraffic_view  = view () {
    jamfprotect_CL
    | where event_metadata_product_s == "Network Traffic Stream"
    // ASIM - Common Fields
    | extend EventVendor = 'Jamf'
    | extend EventProduct = 'Jamf Protect - Network Traffic Stream'
    | project-rename
    | extend
        // Jamf Protect - Common Fields
        EventType = "query",
        EventSubType = "request",
        EventStartTime = unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(tolong(event_receiptTime_d)),
        EventResult = case(event_blocked_b == "false", "Allowed", event_blocked_b == "true", "Prevented", ''),
        // Jamf Protect - Source User
        SrcUsermail=column_ifexists('event_user_email_s', ''),
        SrcUsername =  column_ifexists('event_user_name_s', ''),
        // Jamf Protect - Source Device Hostnames
        DvcHostname = case(isnotempty(input_host_hostname_s), input_host_hostname_s, isnotempty(host_info_host_name_s), host_info_host_name_s, event_device_userDeviceName_s),
        DvcIpAddr = column_ifexists("event_source_ip_s", ""),
        DvcId = column_ifexists("event_device_externalId_g", ""),
        DvcOs = case(event_device_osType_s == "MAC_OS", "macOS", event_device_osType_s == "IOS", "iOS", event_device_osType_s == "ANDROID", "Android", "Other"),
        SrcDeviceType = case(event_device_osType_s == "MAC_OS", "Computer", event_device_osType_s == "IOS", "Mobile Device", event_device_osType_s == "ANDROID", "Mobile Device", "Other"),
        // Jamf Protect - DNS Specific
        DnsQuery = column_ifexists('event_hostName_s', ''),
        DvcAction = case(event_blocked_b == "false", "Allowed", event_blocked_b == "true", "Blocked", ''),
        DnsQueryName = column_ifexists('event_domain_s', ''),
        DstIpAddr = column_ifexists('event_destination_ips_s', ''),
        ThreatCategory = column_ifexists('event_eventType_description_s', ''),
        DnsQueryTypeName = column_ifexists('event_dns_recordType_s', ''),
        DnsResponseName = column_ifexists('event_dns_responseStatus_s', ''),
        ThreatOriginalRiskLevel = column_ifexists('event_threat_result_s', '')
    | project-keep
        TimeGenerated,
        EventVendor,
        EventProduct,
        EventType,
        EventSubType,
        EventStartTime,
        EventResult,
        DvcHostname,
        DvcIpAddr,
        DvcId,
        DvcOs,
        SrcDeviceType,
        SrcUsermail,
        SrcUsername,
        DnsQuery,
        DnsQueryName,
        DstIpAddr,
        DnsQueryTypeName,
        DvcAction,
        DnsResponseName,
        ThreatOriginalRiskLevel
};
// //
// // Jamf Protect - Threat Events

let JamfProtectThreatEvents_view  = view () {
    jamfprotect_CL
    | where event_metadata_product_s == "Threat Events Stream"
    // ASIM - Common Fields
    | extend EventVendor = 'Jamf'
    | extend EventProduct = 'Jamf Protect - Threat Events Stream'
    | project-rename
    | extend
        // Jamf Protect - Common Fields
        EventStartTime = column_ifexists("event_timestamp_t", ""),

        EventReportUrl = column_ifexists("event_eventUrl_s", ""),

        EventSeverity = case(event_severity_d == 2, "Informational", event_severity_d == 4, "Low", event_severity_d == 6, "Medium", event_severity_d == 8, "High", event_severity_d == 10, "High", "Informational"),
        // Jamf Protect - Source User
        SrcUsermail=column_ifexists('event_user_email_s', ''),
        SrcUsername=column_ifexists('event_user_name_s', ''),
        // Jamf Protect - Source Device Hostnames
        DvcHostname = column_ifexists("event_device_userDeviceName_s", ""),
        DvcIpAddr = column_ifexists("event_source_ip_s", ""),
        DvcId = column_ifexists("event_device_externalId_g", ""),
        DvcOs=case(event_device_os_s has "MAC_OS", "macOS", event_device_os_s has "IOS", "iOS", event_device_os_s has "ANDROID", "Android", "Other"),

        // Jamf Protect - DNS Specific
        DnsQuery=column_ifexists('event_hostName_s', ''),
        DvcAction=case(event_blocked_b == "false", "Allowed", event_blocked_b == "true", "Blocked", ''),
        DnsQueryName=column_ifexists('event_destination_name_s', ''),
        DstIpAddr=column_ifexists('event_destination_ip_s', ''),
        ThreatCategory=column_ifexists('event_eventType_description_s', ''),
        ThreatOriginalRiskLevel=column_ifexists('event_threat_result_s', ''),
        // Jamf Protect - App Specific
        TargetFileName = column_ifexists("event_app_name_s", ""),
        TargetFileSHA1 = column_ifexists("event_app_sha1_s", ""),
        TargetFileSHA256 = column_ifexists("event_app_sha256_s", "")
    | project-keep
        TimeGenerated,
        EventVendor,
        EventProduct,
        EventStartTime,
        EventResult,
        EventReportUrl,
        EventSeverity,
        DvcHostname,
        DvcIpAddr,
        DvcId,
        SrcDeviceType,
        SrcUsermail,
        SrcUsername,
        DnsQuery,
        DnsQueryName,
        DstIpAddr,
        ThreatCategory,
        DvcAction,
        ThreatOriginalRiskLevel,
        TargetFileName,
        TargetFileSHA1,
        TargetFileSHA256
};

let JamfProtectAlerts_view  = view () {

//
// Jamf Protect - Network Traffic
//
let JamfProtectNetworkTraffic_view  = view () {
    jamfprotect_CL
    | where event_metadata_product_s == "Network Traffic Stream"
    // ASIM - Common Fields
    | extend EventVendor = 'Jamf'
    | extend EventProduct = 'Jamf Protect - Network Traffic Stream'
    | project-rename
    | extend
        // Jamf Protect - Common Fields
        EventType = "query",
        EventSubType = "request",
        EventStartTime = unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(tolong(event_receiptTime_d)),
        EventResult = case(event_blocked_b == "false", "Allowed", event_blocked_b == "true", "Prevented", ''),
        // Jamf Protect - Source User
        SrcUsermail=column_ifexists('event_user_email_s', ''),
        SrcUsername =  column_ifexists('event_user_name_s', ''),
        // Jamf Protect - Source Device Hostnames
        DvcHostname = case(isnotempty(input_host_hostname_s), input_host_hostname_s, isnotempty(host_info_host_name_s), host_info_host_name_s, event_device_userDeviceName_s),
        DvcIpAddr = column_ifexists("event_source_ip_s", ""),
        DvcId = column_ifexists("event_device_externalId_g", ""),
        DvcOs = case(event_device_osType_s == "MAC_OS", "macOS", event_device_osType_s == "IOS", "iOS", event_device_osType_s == "ANDROID", "Android", "Other"),
        SrcDeviceType = case(event_device_osType_s == "MAC_OS", "Computer", event_device_osType_s == "IOS", "Mobile Device", event_device_osType_s == "ANDROID", "Mobile Device", "Other"),
        // Jamf Protect - DNS Specific
        DnsQuery = column_ifexists('event_hostName_s', ''),
        DvcAction = case(event_blocked_b == "false", "Allowed", event_blocked_b == "true", "Blocked", ''),
        DnsQueryName = column_ifexists('event_domain_s', ''),
        DstIpAddr = column_ifexists('event_destination_ips_s', ''),
        ThreatCategory = column_ifexists('event_eventType_description_s', ''),
        DnsQueryTypeName = column_ifexists('event_dns_recordType_s', ''),
        DnsResponseName = column_ifexists('event_dns_responseStatus_s', ''),
        ThreatOriginalRiskLevel = column_ifexists('event_threat_result_s', '')
    | project-keep
        TimeGenerated,
        EventVendor,
        EventProduct,
        EventType,
        EventSubType,
        EventStartTime,
        EventResult,
        DvcHostname,
        DvcIpAddr,
        DvcId,
        DvcOs,
        SrcDeviceType,
        SrcUsermail,
        SrcUsername,
        DnsQuery,
        DnsQueryName,
        DstIpAddr,
        DnsQueryTypeName,
        DvcAction,
        DnsResponseName,
        ThreatOriginalRiskLevel
};
// //
// // Jamf Protect - Threat Events
// //
let JamfProtectThreatEvents_view  = view () {
    jamfprotect_CL
    | where event_metadata_product_s == "Threat Events Stream"
    // ASIM - Common Fields
    | extend EventVendor = 'Jamf'
    | extend EventProduct = 'Jamf Protect - Threat Events Stream'
    | project-rename
    | extend
        // Jamf Protect - Common Fields
        EventStartTime = column_ifexists("event_timestamp_t", ""),
        EventResult=case(event_action_s == "Blocked", "Blocked", event_action_s == "Detected", "Detected", ''),
        EventReportUrl = column_ifexists("event_eventUrl_s", ""),
        // Jamf Protect - Alert Details
        EventSeverity = case(event_severity_d == 2, "Informational", event_severity_d == 4, "Low", event_severity_d == 6, "Medium", event_severity_d == 8, "High", event_severity_d == 10, "High", "Informational"),
        // Jamf Protect - Source User
        SrcUsermail=column_ifexists('event_user_email_s', ''),
        SrcUsername=column_ifexists('event_user_name_s', ''),
        // Jamf Protect - Source Device Hostnames
        DvcHostname = column_ifexists("event_device_userDeviceName_s", ""),
        DvcIpAddr = column_ifexists("event_source_ip_s", ""),
        DvcId = column_ifexists("event_device_externalId_g", ""),
        DvcOs=case(event_device_os_s has "MAC_OS", "macOS", event_device_os_s has "IOS", "iOS", event_device_os_s has "ANDROID", "Android", "Other"),
        SrcDeviceType=case(event_device_os_s has "MAC_OS", "Computer", event_device_os_s has "IOS", "Mobile Device", event_device_os_s has "ANDROID", "Mobile Device", "Other"),
        // Jamf Protect - DNS Specific
        DnsQuery=column_ifexists('event_hostName_s', ''),
        DvcAction=case(event_blocked_b == "false", "Allowed", event_blocked_b == "true", "Blocked", ''),
        DnsQueryName=column_ifexists('event_destination_name_s', ''),
        DstIpAddr=column_ifexists('event_destination_ip_s', ''),
        ThreatCategory=column_ifexists('event_eventType_description_s', ''),
        ThreatOriginalRiskLevel=column_ifexists('event_threat_result_s', ''),
        // Jamf Protect - App Specific
        TargetFileName = column_ifexists("event_app_name_s", ""),
        TargetFileSHA1 = column_ifexists("event_app_sha1_s", ""),
        TargetFileSHA256 = column_ifexists("event_app_sha256_s", "")
    | project-keep
        TimeGenerated,
        EventVendor,
        EventProduct,
        EventStartTime,
        EventResult,
        EventReportUrl,
        EventSeverity,
        DvcHostname,
        DvcIpAddr,
        DvcId,
        SrcDeviceType,
        SrcUsermail,
        SrcUsername,
        DnsQuery,
        DnsQueryName,
        DstIpAddr,
        ThreatCategory,
        DvcAction,
        ThreatOriginalRiskLevel,
        TargetFileName,
        TargetFileSHA1,
        TargetFileSHA256
};

metadata.description:
This Jamf Protect Workbook for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Jamf Protect events forwarded into Microsoft Sentinel.
 Providing reports into all alerts, device controls and Unfied Logs.

The [Jamf Protect](https://www.jamf.com/solutions/threat-prevention-remediation/) for Microsoft Sentinel solution creates detailed event data from macOS endpoints into a Microsoft Sentinel workspace in a simple and easy workflow. The solution provides you with full visibility into Apple Endpoint Security by leveraging Workbooks containing [Alert](https://docs.jamf.com/jamf-protect/documentation/Alerts.html) and [Unified Logging](https://docs.jamf.com/jamf-protect/documentation/Unified_Logging.html) events captured by Jamf Protect and the [macOS built-in security events](https://support.apple.com/en-gb/guide/security/sec469d47bd8/web) that occurred across the protected organisational endpoints


#### Changelog

**v2.2.0**

***Workbook***
 - Added System Performance Metrics
    - Includes Energy Impact
 - Added Network Traffic Stream
 - Updated Workbook to make use of the newly added parser
 - Added and tweaked querys and graphs

 ***Parser***
 - Added JamfProtect parser for parsing and mapping all incoming raw data.

 ***Analytic Rules***
 - Updated Analytic Rules to make use of the newly added parser. 
	
**v2.1**

***Workbook***

- Added Network Threat Events

- Added new Pickers

- Added Changelog

**Analytic Rules**

- Added Analytic Rules
	- Jamf Protect - Alerts
	- Jamf Protect - Unified Logs
	- Jamf Protect - Network Threat Events


 **v2.0**

properties.description:
@{workbookKey=JamfProtectWorkbook; logoFileName=jamf_logo.svg; description=This Jamf Protect Workbook for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Jamf Protect events forwarded into Microsoft Sentinel.
 Providing reports into all alerts, device controls and Unfied Logs.; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=2.0.0; title=Jamf Protect Workbook; templateRelativePath=JamfProtectDashboard.json; subtitle=; provider=Jamf Software, LLC}.description
JamfProtectAlerts_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.2.0
Creates an incident based on Jamf Protect Alert data in Microsoft Sentinel
properties.query:
JamfProtect
| where EventProduct == "Jamf Protect - Alerts"
    and isnotempty(EventSeverity)
| extend
    algorithm = "SHA256",
    Host_IPs = tostring(parse_json(DvcIpAddr)[0]),
    Tags = tostring(Match_facts[0].tags),
    Tactics = case(Match_tags has "Execution", "Execution", Match_tags has "Visibility", "Visibility", Match_tags has "Persistence", "Persistence", Match_tags has "LateralMovement", "LateralMovement", Match_tags has "CredentialAccess", "CredentialAcccess", Match_tags has "DefenseEvasion", "DefenseEvasion", Match_tags has "PrivilegeEscalation", "PrivilegeEscalation", Match_tags has "Impact", "Impact", Match_tags has "CommandAndControl", "CommandandControl", Match_tags has "Discovery", "Discovery", Match_tags has "InitialAccess", "InitialAccess", ""),
    Techniques = pack_array(extract(@"[A-Za-z]\d{4}", 0, tostring(Match_tags))),
    JamfPro = case(Match_actions has "SmartGroup", "Workflow with Jamf Pro", Match_actions has "Prevented", "No workflow, Prevented by Protect", "No workflow")

properties.description: JamfProtectNetworkThreats_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.2.0
Creates an incident based based on Jamf Protect's Network Threat Event Stream alerts.
properties.query:
JamfProtect
| where EventProduct == "Jamf Protect - Threat Events Stream"
    and EventResult == "Blocked"
    and isnotempty(EventSeverity)
| extend Tactics = "Initial Access"
| extend Techniques = "T1566"

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: A Network Threat has been {{EventResult}} on {{DvcHostname}}

properties.description: JamfProtectUnifiedLogs_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.2.0
Creates an informational incident based on Jamf Protect Unified Log data in Microsoft Sentinel
properties.query:
JamfProtect
| where EventType == "UnifiedLog"
| where isnotempty(EventSeverity)
| extend Host_IPs = tostring(parse_json(DvcIpAddr)[0])

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: {{EventDescription}} has been captured in the unified logs

metadata.title: Jamf Protect - Set Alert to In Progress
metadata.description: This Jamf Protect Playbook can be used manually or in a Automation Rule to change the state of the Alert in Jamf Protect itself, in an automated way you can mirror the state from a Microsoft Sentinel incident back to Jamf Protect.
mainSteps: 1. Fetches the AlertUDID from the Alert of Jamf Protect
2. Generates a Access Token to authenticate against the Jamf Protect GraphQL API
3. Changes the Alert status in Jamf Protect to In Progress
prerequisites: 1. Generate API Client in Jamf Protect and take note of the CLientID and Password. [learn how](https://learn.jamf.com/bundle/jamf-protect-documentation/page/Jamf_Protect_API.html#ariaid-title3)
2. Use the ClientID and Password during the deployment of this Playbook
postDeployment: 1. In Microsoft Sentinel Analytic Rules for Jamf Protect - Alerts should be configured to create an incident
2. Configure the Automation Rules to trigger this playbook once a incident is status is changed to Active

2. Generates a Access Token to authenticate against the Jamf Protect GraphQL API
3. Changes the Alert status in Jamf Protect to Resolved
prerequisites: 1. Generate API Client in Jamf Protect and take note of the CLientID and Password. [learn how](https://learn.jamf.com/bundle/jamf-protect-documentation/page/Jamf_Protect_API.html#ariaid-title3)
2. Use the ClientID and Password during the deployment of this Playbook
postDeployment: 1. In Microsoft Sentinel Analytic Rules for Jamf Protect - Alerts should be configured to create an incident
2. Configure the Automation Rules to trigger this playbook once a incident is status is changed to Active

metadata.title: Jamf Protect - Remote lock computer with Jamf Pro
metadata.description: This Playbook can be used manually or in a Automation Rule to send an remote MDM command with Jamf Pro to lock the computer with an randomised 6 digit passcode.
mainSteps: 1. Fetches the Host entity from the Incident created based on event data from Jamf Protect
2. Generates a Access Token using a API Client to authenticate against the Jamf Pro API
3. Retrieves the JSSID and ManagementUUID from Jamf Pro for given computer
4. Sends a remote lock MDM command with a randomised 6 digit passcode
5. Randomised passcode will be stored in the Comments section of the incident itself.
prerequisites: 1. Create an API Client in Jamf Pro that is capable of reading computers and sending remote commands. [learn how](https://learn.jamf.com/bundle/jamf-pro-documentation-current)
2. Use the Client ID and Secret during the deployment of this Playbook
postDeployment: 1. This Playbook can be best used as Action while investigating an Incident.

releaseNotes.title: Jamf Protect - Remote lock computer with Jamf Pro
